content:
Munich IETF WEBDAV Working Group Meeting

Munich Sheraton, Munich, Germany

August 11, 1997

The purpose of this meeting was to introduce the design of the properties, collections, and namespace operations aspects of the protocol specification, draft-ietf-webdav-protocol-01.txt. Selected issues relating to properties and collections were presented and discussed.

Agenda
Minutes

The following presentations were made at the meeting.

WEBDAV Design Overview, Jim Whitehead
WEBDAV Issues, Jim Whitehead
University of California, Irvine
Jim Whitehead <ejw@ics.uci.edu>
Department of Information and Computer Science
247 ICS2 #3425
Irvine, CA 92697-3425

Last modified: 03 Sep 1997
